commit_list.message:
Added Hebrew translations, various fixes (#207)

* added/fixed hebrew translations for some names

* removed redundent entry for gabriel

* added hebrew translations, and removed redundencies

* removed redundant translation of michelle

* removed redundant translation of sergey

* removed incorrect meaning of vrunda (basil in hebrew is ריחן or בזיליקום)

* added some more hebrew names, fixed issue with filename

* Update some names to English version

* save file
commit_list.repo_description: :rocket: A multilingual collection of names from around the world

commit_list.message:
say: Add reference to 'espeak'

When I first read this README I skimmed past the `extension` section
since it said "if you're on a Mac", and I'm using Linux. I'm glad I took
the time to find an alternative, it was really fun, and I wanted to make
sure others will be made aware of it too.

https://github.com/exercism/problem-specifications/pull/1248

Add referance to 'espeak'

When I first read this README I skimmed past the `extension` section since it said "if you're on a Mac", and I'm using Linux. I'm glad I took the time to find an alternative, it was really fun, and I wanted to make sure others will be made aware of it too.

I'd be happy to receive feedback on the construction of the sentence. I'm sure it can be improved.

:stuck_out_tongue_winking_eye: Make users laugh when your app loads.
